tasks.build-all: deno run build-win; deno run build-mac; deno run build-mac-arm; deno run build-linux; deno run build-linux-arm
tasks.build-win: deno run build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o out/win/strudelfy main.ts
tasks.build-mac: deno run build --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o out/mac/strudelfy main.ts
tasks.build-mac-arm: deno run build --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o out/mac-arm/strudelfy main.ts
tasks.build-linux: deno run build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o out/linux/strudelfy main.ts
tasks.build-linux-arm: deno run build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu -o out/linux-arm/strudelfy main.ts
